name: Conveyer Madness
description:
Welcome to Conveyer Madness!

In this game, you will need to rotate the intersections to get the crates to their respective destinations. However, things can quickly get tricky as multiple crates can come at the same time and you will have to strategize in order to avoid letting crates fall.
This game was made for the Scorespace Game Jam in 3 days.

#indiedev #solodev #gamejam #scorejam
